Name: Christmas Race
About the game: Help Santa pick up presents on the trail! The more gifts you collect, the higher your score! You can also buy new characters and sledge in the shop! Merry Christmas ! Features: ■ A very slippery slope! ■ Pretty decorations! ■ A store with no less than 15 characters and 36 sleds! ■ Infinite levels and completely random! ■ A nice ambient music! ■ Addictive gameplay!
Meta Title: Christmas Race: Dec 1, 2017, RewindApp and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Christmas Race? Check out the release date (Dec 1, 2017), developer insights from RewindApp, and a complete game summary.
